Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Dorchester
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via 67th, Woodlawn, Marquette, Stony Island and 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Woodlawn, Marquette, Stony Island, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Dorchester.

Allow extra travel time.
